attributes.action: Free parking on local PARKS & PLAY GROUNDS
attributes.background: We contribute huge tax amount from our monthly salary to Government. Whenever you go to any local parks with children we have to pay parking fee and even they have time restriction up to 10 PM, We demand all PARKS should be PARKING FREE on first come first serve basis.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Local authority owned parks and playgrounds are the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
